text: @marcorubio So you believe that 4 out of 10 people hospitalized are positive for #COVID19, but are there for something else? That means we have an emergency underlying issue, or #COVID19 is spreading through hospitals like wild fire. That would lead me to question the data.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
